info.name: Customize DeviantArt watch bar
info.description: Makes the DeviantArt watch bar look better. Options for where to show the selected changes, whether to display the bar at all, to make it stick to the top and not scroll down the page, to shrink the bar or not, to show only the Notifications/Notes links, to remove the separator, and/or recolor the bar.
